SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientControllerInterface, ControllerInterface
public class ClientController extends Object implements ClientControllerInterface
The ClientController class manages client-side operations and interactions with the game server. It handles network communication, updates client-side data (ViewModel), manages game states, and interacts with the user interface (ViewState).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final Client
    CLIENT
    The Client instance responsible for network communication with the game server.
    final ErrorLogger
    ERROR_LOGGER
    The ErrorLogger instance for logging errors and exceptions that occur on the client side.
    final ViewModel
    VIEWMODEL
    The ViewModel instance that holds client-side data related to the game state, lobby information, and player details.

    • updateLobby

      public void updateLobby(Lobby lobby)
      Updates the lobby in the ViewModel and updates the current view state. When a lobby has no players, it gets deleted, if contains this client's nickname, the client joins it on the ViewModel, if the client isn't in the received lobby anymore, and it was in previously, leaves it and update the ViewModel accordingly.
      Specified by:
      updateLobby in interface ClientControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      lobby - The updated lobby received from the server.

      Parameters:

      Specified by:
      restoreGame in interface ClientControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      gameDTO - The game data received from the server.
      currentState - The state of the game when the client disconnected.
      PLAYERS_FIELD - The field state of players when the client disconnected.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String nickname, GenericPair<Integer,Integer> coordinates, int cardID, Side playedSide, EnumMap<Resource,Integer> ownedResources, List<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>> openCorners, int points)
      Executes the placement of a card on the game board and updates the client's game state.
      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface ClientControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player who placed the card.
      coordinates - The coordinates where the card was placed.
      cardID - The ID of the card placed.
      playedSide - The side of the card that was played (top or bottom).
      ownedResources - The resources owned by the player after placing the card.
      openCorners - The open corners on the player's tableau after placing the card.
      points - The points scored by the player after placing the card.
